title: AppSync to Lambda
description: Create an AppSync API with a direct Lambda resolver

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This CDK application deploys an AppSync API which uses direct Lambda resolvers. On querying the AppSync API, AppSync will invoke the Lambda function and provides default payload to your Lambda function as well as a default translation from a Lambda function's response to a GraphQL type.
See the Github repo for detailed instructions
